Author: LanayruPromenade
Text: I don't know which country you're in, but it might help to seek counseling or a psychiatrist. When I have those feelings it's usually because of chemical imbalances in my brain. As far as 'it gets better' I don't know if it does, but things do change and 'it gets different' sometimes the differences will be worse, sometimes it will be better. It's how you respond to them.  &#x200B;  I wish I could offer more sage advice, but I am in the same boat. I have an ED in order to stop living and this past week I have been even more depressed and careless with my eating and have been gaining weight. When I die, I want to be skinny, painfully thin.  &#x200B;  If you ever want to talk, you can always PM me.
